title: The monolith
text: I approached the monolith with caution, scanning frequently to make sure there was no one else around.
Once I realised I was the only one here, I approached on foot.
Touching the monolith, my mind was filled with strange visions. They seemed to be guiding me towards something called the 'atlas'.
The visions fade and I'm left with more questions than answers. Mostly just one question.
What the hell is 'atlas', is it something to do with the 'atlas pass' those containers need?
